title: Namer vs. Namer
description: Josh brings the case against his wife Jackie. They each kept their respective surnames when they married, and now can't decide on a last name for their future children. Should the kids take their mom or dad's last name, combine them, or take on a brand new appellation? Only one man can decide.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
